title: So hard to grind out an account.
body: Pretty much the title.... you don't get enough BE per level at all... riot just throws you scraps and u pretty much have to play 8 hours a day to get anywhere, and i played about 6 to grind out my account which has taken about 2 months...  i feel like doubling BE wouldn't even be over kill at all.. i own like 21 champs and they are all the cheapest ones u can buy
